assessment_item.title: LC4VMA-Q7-ATP என்பது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ATP என்பது? 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ஆக்சிஜனேற்றத்தில் பங்கேற்கும் ஒரு நொதி        

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2042"},{"text":"

ஹார்மோன்   

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2043"},{"text":"

ஒரு புரதம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2053"},{"text":"

ஆற்றல் மிக்க பாஸ்பேட் பிணைப்புகள் கொண்ட மூலக்கூறு

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2058"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LC4VMA-Q7-ATP என்பது?","title":"LC4VMA-Q7-ATP என்பது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
